EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.XLE.Health.N.G.N.18522.Healthcare nurture.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Critical network for the digital transformation of healthcare
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Healthcare cloud infrastructure: SDN and network virtualization Digital transformation is a growing business imperative for healthcare providers, and cloud computing is a critical element in your digital transformation strategy. As private-hybrid cloud models are essential for a secure and scalable transformation, the focus turns to the network in the data center, between data centers, and across the wide area network.
Read IDC’s Technology Spotlight, “SDN and Network Virtualization <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2220.Gamechanger.IDC.Spotlight.html]]>”, to learn the network is critical for your digital transformation. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin Head of Healthcare Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it <[[https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
